description: Try our easy to follow Slow-Cooked Lemon & White Wine Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Slow-Cooked Lemon & White Wine Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Set the slow cooker to HIGH and cook for 1 hour or until chicken is cooked through. Stir in capers. Serve with steamed green beans and charred lemon wedges.
